text: ini avar tirinnukalayukayanenkil (nabiye,) ninne nam avarute mel kavalkkaranayi ayaccittilla. ninre mel prabeadhana badhyata matrameyullu. tirccayayum nam manusyan nam'mute pakkal ninnulla oru anugraham asvadippiccal atinre peril avan ahladam keallunnu. avarute kaikal mump ceytu veccatinre phalamayi avarkk valla tinmayum badhikkunnuvenkilea appealata manusyan nandikettavan tanneyakunnu
